The echo signals are processed with a dechirping manner and residual video phase (RVP)
correction, and the expression of the radar echo becomes:
For the InISAR imaging, the distance from antennas to the turntable center is far larger than the
size of target, thus the assumption of plane wave model is generally applied to simplify the signal
expression. In this assumption, the radar echo can be expressed as:
is small enough to feed the range-Doppler imaging
are applied to further simplify the radar echo expression.
